body.description: Amazon Basics Daily Pantiliners, Long Length, Unscented are the perfect liners to protect against light leaks. The thin, absorbent liners are comfortable with wear all day on light days, or as extra protection. Everyday liners provide moderate leakage protection for period or wetness leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As someone who values comfort and reliability in feminine hygiene products, I recently tried out these pantyliners, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. Here's why:Comfortable Fit: These pantyliners are incredibly soft and flexible, making them comfortable to wear all day long. They conform to the body's contours without feeling bulky or restrictive.Absorbency: Despite their slim design, these pantyliners offer excellent absorbency.Discreetness: One of the things I appreciate most about these pantyliners is how discreet they are.Adhesive: The adhesive on these pantyliners is strong enough to keep them securely in place without causing any discomfort when removing them.Scent-free: I prefer feminine hygiene products that are scent-free, and these pantyliners deliver on that front. They're free from any artificial fragrances, which is a big plus for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are less expensive than the Always brand and do the same thing. They last longer and I love them. I don’t notice a difference between the brands. I have purchased several times and will continue to do so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are ok for the money
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try these Amazon Basics liners as they were a little bit cheaper than what I usually buy. They are ok. They aren't as long as my regular brand. They don't stick quite as well. My regular liners are better but these are ok. I do like to save money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and effective
reviews.reviewText: I've found that these inexpensive pads work just as well as the more expensive kind w/a lot less waste. More important these days. They don't always come through the shipping proccess w/the box intact though. I'd order them with something that's going to come in a box. If they come in one of those envelopes there's a pretty high chance it will be damaged. Sometimes it's minor but last time it was so bad I couldn't use them.I still recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Liner Sides Tear Within Hours of Wearing, Separating From the Main Body, Scratchy and Uncomfortable
reviews.reviewText: These are by far the worst quality panty liner I have ever purchased. As the headline states, within hours, the sides of the liner tear away from the main pad which deteriorates its ability to provide any protection. When this occurs, it bunches up and becomes uncomfortable. I had originally searched for Extra Long on the Amazon site and when it brought up various different sizes of boxes, the color of the boxes were all the same, so I chose one that had a good price and quantity. When I received it, I found that they had sent Regular instead. I phoned them and they informed me that I had ordered that size. I told them no, I had searched for Extra Long and had chosen a size on that product page. The agent informed me that the page included all different sizes and the quantity and volume I had selected came only in Regular. I asked her then why did it come up when I requested Extra Long? I assumed as all the boxes were the same color that this was the size searched for. In any case, this is an unusable product and a waste of money. Find another brand that has good customer satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long panty liner
reviews.reviewText: These are just as good as the name brand ones. Without the price. I did a side by side comparison cause I had some and the color was the only difference. Walmart brand was the same too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I grabbed these on a last-minute whim and I'm so happy I did. They've come in handy and are just plain nice to have They adhere nicely and the absorbancy is great and hasn't given me any issues. Overall, a great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adhere well, priced well but too wide
reviews.reviewText: These are affordable and I prefer that they're not individually wrapped. They adhere well but they are so wide that they extend outside panty, and scratch skin on legs. The only solution is to trim them with scissors, which is time consuming. They need to be 1/4 " narrower on both sides.
